title: Florida man's mugshot goes viral for his very distinctive look
text:
Modeling gigs may not be in this felons near future.

Ricky Deeley's mugshot quickly went viral after it was posted by the Marion County Sheriff's Department in Florida on Wednesday.

The 34-year-old was pulled over during a routine traffic stop on Tuesday night and it was determined that he was driving with a suspended license.

Ricky Deeley's mugshot quickly went viral after it was posted by the Marion County Sheriff's Department in Florida on Wednesday - but he won't be offered any modeling gigs

Joseph Tindale and Katlyn Spruill were also arrested with Keeley. Keeley had possession of 23 grams of methamphetamine, a handgun, marijuana, 20 Methylin pills and a digital scale

According to a release shared on the department's Facebook, passenger Logan Tindale was in the car with Deeley at the time.

A Deputy Bowman soon learned that the 20-year-old had a felony warrant out for his arrest, even though Tindale lied about his identity when initially questioned.

Another passenger in the vehicle, 20-year-old Katlyn Spruill, was found to be in possession of 23 grams of methamphetamine, a handgun, marijuana, 20 Methylin pills and a digital scale.

All three were arrested and taken to the Marion County Jail.

While all three mugshots were shared in the same post, Deeley's was more prominent - giving social media users ample room to poke fun at the man's expense

Keeley and the two passengers were arrested and transported to the Marion County jail

While all three mugshots were shared in the same post, Deeley's was more prominent - giving social media users ample room to poke fun at the man's expense.

The department's post with the release has been shared just under 4,000 times.

One user asked: 'Why didn't bro just flap his ears and fly away?'

The Dumbo reference was often used to describe Deeley's ear.

Deeley had several Facebook profiles, all claiming to be from different parts of Florida

'All I can say is WOW DUDE, Hope you not related to Dumbo. He's much more Handsome,' someone claimed.

'What planet did he come from? Lol,' another person wondered.

'This is what incest looks like,' another declared.

Several users shared images of characters they believed Deeley looked like, including hilarious shots of Shrek and Gollum from The Lord of the Rings.

One user asked: 'Why didn't bro just flap his ears and fly away?'

'All I can say is WOW DUDE, Hope you not related to Dumbo. He's much more Handsome,' someone claimed

'What planet did he come from? Lol,' another person wondered

'This is what incest looks like,' another declared
description: Ricky Deeley's mugshot quickly went viral after it was posted by the Marion County Sheriff's Department in Florida on Wednesday. Many pointed out the man's ears when comparing him to Meeks.
